import PropTypes from 'prop-types' function Persons({ persons, searchTerm, deletePerson }) { return (
{persons.map( (person) => person.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) && ( ) )}
Name Number Action
{person.name} {' '} {person.number}
) } Persons.propTypes = { persons: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.element), searchTerm: PropTypes.string, deletePerson: PropTypes.func, } export default Persons
